biotools.summary: iCNAsim is a software package for improved simulation of single-cell copy number alteration (CNA) data from tumours. CNAsim can be used to generate copy number profiles with noise patterns that mimic those of single-cell CNA detection algorithms, and to generate DNA-seq data for sampled cells.

bioschemas.name: CNAsim
